text: 10.9: Jer 15.16Gu ne mbararagiap, mba enser han vov, khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu mba gava bisaneŋ nan nɨɨŋ.” Ana mbara khaŋ na nzuai, “Ndu ana ndigip, ana mbɨ. Ndu ana mbegɨrga, ndu fheeŋ shiv keŋkeŋ maanga. Ndu ana mbɨrga, ana ndun kamthoon guigira vhergip, hanin vhera farar muuŋgirga.” 10.9 Kha bigɨn “Hani,” ana mbɨn vher ma. Ana para gum nɨɨŋnɨɨiŋ mbui mbɨ ma. Nta ndɨɨa ruav, parawa shivir phara ndia vov, hani ga mbui. Gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve ana pav, anan wari won mba suim, nta vhergi.
